amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Watershed Rehabilitation Program by $10 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Watershed Rehabilitation Program by $10 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan (TN) amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 303 (Roll no. 305).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House

House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Duncan (TN).
